# ROS Global Solutions - llms-full.txt

> Comprehensive information for AI systems about ROS Global Solutions FZE

## Company Overview

**ROS Global Solutions FZE** is a total engineering solutions provider based in Sharjah, UAE. We specialize in delivering mission-critical products and consulting services to the world's most demanding industries.

### Core Business Areas

1. **Oil & Gas Equipment Supply** - Field surface facility equipment and drilling support
2. **HVAC Systems** - Industrial climate control and air quality management
3. **Data Center Solutions** - Air and chemical filtration for critical infrastructure
4. **Rhamnolipids** - Bio-surfactant products through exclusive partnership with AGAE Technologies

### Contact Information

- **Company Name**: ROS Global Solutions FZE
- **Email**: inquiry@rosglobal.com | sales@rosglobal.com
- **Phone**: +971 6 704 1447
- **Mobile**: +971 54 791 7288 | +971 56 547 7065
- **Address**: 16G-01, Hamriya Free Zone, Sharjah, UAE, PO Box 52319
- **Website**: https://rosglobal.com

---

## Oil & Gas Products

### Field Surface Facility - Electrical
Complete electrical systems for oil & gas field operations:
- Power distribution systems (120V-4160V)
- Control panels and safety equipment
- Hazardous location rated (Class I, Div 1&2)
- Certifications: UL, CSA, ATEX

### Field Surface Facility - Mechanical
Mechanical equipment for surface operations:
- Pumps and compressors (10-5000 GPM)
- Valves, pipes, and fittings
- Processing equipment
- API 610, 674 compliant

### Field Surface Facility - Instrumentation
Precision monitoring and control:
- Flow meters and pressure gauges
- Temperature sensors
- Smart transmitters (HART, Foundation Fieldbus)
- SIL 2/3 safety rated

### Drilling Equipment
- Mud pump systems (3000-7500 PSI)
- Rig floor equipment
- Supporting onshore and offshore operations

---

## HVAC Products

### Dehumidifiers & Humidifiers
Commercial-grade humidity control:
- Capacity: 10-500 pints/day
- Operating range: 41-95°F
- Applications: Data centers, healthcare, food processing

### Celdec Evaporative Cooling Pads
High-efficiency evaporative cooling:
- Temperature drop: 10-20°F
- Efficiency: 80-90%
- Applications: Cooling towers, greenhouses, industrial cooling

### Air Filtration
HEPA-grade filtration systems:
- Efficiency: 99.97% at 0.3 microns
- MERV Rating: 13-16
- Applications: Clean rooms, hospitals, manufacturing

### Gas Filtration
Chemical and odor removal:
- Removal efficiency: >95%
- Activated carbon media
- Applications: Chemical plants, laboratories, wastewater

---

## Data Center Solutions

Specialized filtration for mission-critical facilities:

- **Air Filtration**: HEPA/ULPA systems for particulate removal
- **Chemical Filtration**: Protection against corrosive gases (H2S, SO2, NOx)
- **Precision Cooling**: Temperature accuracy ±1°F
- **Environmental Control**: Integrated monitoring and management

Benefits:
- Equipment protection from contamination
- Extended hardware lifespan
- Energy efficiency optimization
- ASHRAE compliance

---

## Rhamnolipids Bio-Surfactants

**Exclusive MENA Distributor of AGAE Technologies (USA)**

### What are Rhamnolipids?
Rhamnolipids are 100% biodegradable bio-surfactants produced through microbial fermentation. They outperform synthetic surfactants in:
- High salinity environments
- Extreme temperatures (>90°C)
- Wide pH range (2-12)

### Product Grades
- R90: 90% purity (Industrial)
- R95: 95% purity (Technical)
- R99: 99% purity (Pharmaceutical/Cosmetic)

### Applications

**Energy & Oil**
- Microbial Enhanced Oil Recovery (MEOR)
- Tank cleaning and sludge removal
- Optimized for Gulf region conditions

**Personal Care**
- Sulfate-free shampoos
- Luxury skincare formulations
- Clean beauty ingredients

**Agriculture**
- Soil wetting agents
- Natural biopesticides
- Water conservation in arid climates

**Environmental**
- Oil spill remediation
- Heavy metal removal
- Non-toxic, marine-safe

---

- Oil & Gas (Upstream, Midstream)
- Data Centers & IT Infrastructure
- Healthcare & Hospitals
- Manufacturing & Industrial
- Food Processing
- Agriculture
- Pharmaceuticals & Cosmetics
- Wastewater Treatment

## Why Choose ROS Global

- **Global Supply Chain**: Worldwide sourcing and distribution
- **Industry Expertise**: Decades of experience

- **Regional Expertise**: Deep understanding of MENA market
